@@ -193,1 +193,8 @@ - *

Random Number Generator Algorithms Available in Java SE

+ *

Random Number Generator Algorithms Available.

+ * + * @implSpec These algorithms must be found with the current version of Java SE. + * An implementation may recognize additional algorithms. + * Availability of certain algorithms is subject to change in the future; + * new algorithms may be added, older algorithms may be deprecated. + * Accordingly, user should code fallback to alternate algorithms or + * the default provided by RandomGeneratorFactory.getDefault().
